member.value: A boolean indicating whether the warehouse is a fulfillment center.

member.name: P:EPiServer.ContentApi.Commerce.Internal.Models.Warehouse.WarehouseApiModel.IsPickupLocation
member.summary: Indicates whether the warehouse is a pick-up location. This means orders can be placed from this warehouse for in-store pickups.
member.value: A boolean indicating whether the warehouse is a pickup location.

member.name: P:EPiServer.ContentApi.Commerce.Internal.Models.Warehouse.WarehouseApiModel.IsDeliveryLocation
member.summary: Indicates whether the warehouse is a delivery location. This means this warehouse can be used as a delivery location (i.e. for future in-store pickups).
member.value: A boolean indicating whether the warehouse is a delivery location.
